title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 101.9 - Federal income tax computations not allowable for New York State personal income tax purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 101.9 - Federal income tax computations not allowable for New York State personal income tax purposes

State Regulations

Certain alternate methods of computing Federal income tax presently contained in the Internal Revenue Code (e.g., under the claim of right provisions pursuant to section
1341(a)(5)
of the Internal Revenue Code), or which may be authorized by the Internal Revenue Code as amended from time to time, are not allowed in computing New York State personal income tax under article 22 of the Tax Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
101.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
